channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: 4 Ways to Access Your Home Assistant Server Remotely
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.description: Keep on eye on your place, wherever you are.
item.content:encoded: It’s easy to recommend Home Assistant to anyone who wants a powerful and versatile smart home, but in its default state, the platform operates wholly offline. For many, this is a feature since it means there’s no reliance on the cloud.

item.title: This EcoFlow Station Is the Ultimate Power Outage Companion
item.dc:creator: Corbin Davenport
item.description: Is your refrigerator running? Well, when you catch it, power it with this big battery.
item.content:encoded: EcoFlow sells many portable power stations, but the Delta 3 Max Plus is one of the most versatile options. The 120V and 20A AC output support and rated capacity of 2048Wh makes it a great option for outdoors trips, home power outages, and everything in between. There are a few catches, though.

item.title: 3 HBO Max Shows to Binge This Weekend (September 10 - 12)
item.dc:creator: Derek Malcolm
item.description: HBO Max has some of the best TV shows in the world, just ripe for the weekend picking.
item.content:encoded: What I love most about HBO Max is that even though I've been watching its shows and movies for more than 25 years, when I start digging back into its library, I'm amazed to uncover things I've never heard of or had nearly forgotten about. Of course, it also continues to crank out excellent new shows, but the breadth of options it provides is still impressive.

item.title: 3 Prime Video Shows You Should Watch This Weekend (October 10 - 12)
item.dc:creator: Keeley Brooks
item.description: This weekend, explore a nightmarish town, a time-bending pasture portal, and Tom Hardy like you've never seen him.
item.content:encoded: If you’re looking for some good shows to binge this weekend that will indeed set the tone for your spooktacular month, Amazon Prime Video has you covered. This weekend, we’re diving into a supernatural neo-Western starring Josh Brolin, a super creepy sci-fi horror series that’ll have you scratching your head, and a dark, provocative Tom Hardy series that’s making a comeback.

item.title: 3 Netflix Shows You Need to Binge This Weekend (October 10 - 12)
item.dc:creator: Joe Keeley
item.description: Need a laugh? Want some zombie thrills? Fancy some superhero adventures? Dive in!
item.content:encoded: Netflix has a wealth of TV shows at your fingertips—the tough part is deciding what to watch. If you've carved out some viewing time this weekend, I've got three recommendations for shows that are bound to entertain.

item.title: Windows 11's New Start Menu Is Back
item.dc:creator: Corbin Davenport
item.description: Will it actually roll out to everyone this time?
item.content:encoded: Microsoft is testing a revamped Start Menu for Windows 11, starting in the Canary Channel for Insiders. It’s much larger than the previous design, and it will hopefully require less scrolling or searching to find the apps you need.

item.title: Home Assistant and iPhone Critical Alerts Are a Match Made in Heaven
item.dc:creator: Adam Davidson
item.content:encoded: Some iPhone apps can use critical alerts to bypass your iPhone's settings and play audible notifications even when your iPhone is in Silent mode or Do Not Disturb focus. Using Home Assistant, it's possible to send bespoke critical alerts for any reason that you want.

item.title: Intel’s Core Ultra Series 3 Processors Will Have a Few Surprises
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: Some good, some not so much.
item.content:encoded: We're fast approaching the end of the year, and as it's usually the case, we're starting to see the stuff that will power our hardware next year. Intel's Core Ultra Series 3 is finally here, and there's a few things you should know.

item.title: This EcoFlow Power Station Could 'Overheat and Ignite' Without a Firmware Update
item.dc:creator: Corbin Davenport
item.description: If you have an EcoFlow Delta Max 2000 Power Station, install the latest firmware update now.
item.content:encoded: EcoFlow has announced a recall of its Delta Max 2000 power stations, due to a problem that caused some units to “overheat and ignite.” You don’t have to return or mail the power station, though—you just need to install a firmware update.

item.title: Don't Overlook the Remote When Buying Your Next TV
item.dc:creator: Aran Folsom
item.description: Minor oversights can have major repercussions.
item.content:encoded: The time has finally come to replace your old TV. You've checked every spec down to the nit count, but have you thought about the remote? Is it missing essential features, or is it so feature-packed that you're left fumbling to find that one rarely-used yet super-important button? Is it compatible with the rest of your entertainment system? How easy will it be to replace if you don't want an aftermarket duplicate?
